transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir, PL Industries se bol rahe the?
Customer: PL Industries?
Executive: Haan. Ji bataiye.
Customer: Wo madam ji ne boli thi ki wo call karke mujhe number update karana hai.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Actually aaj off hai sir, agar possible hai to aap Monday call kar lijiye. Madam bole ki call team ko call kare to aaj off hai sir, Saturday.
Customer: Saturday is India off rehta hai India Mart ka sir.
Customer: Theek hai, madam se baat. Haan ek bar aap call kar lijiyega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs to update his number.

Resolution:

- Executive informed it is a holiday.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- number update, holiday, call back
